title: Fix Contact Us mailto link to display email address

requirements.text: Update the Contact Us button implementation in frontend/src/App.tsx so that clicking it properly opens the user's default email client with viitjeetec@gmail.com as the recipient address, ensuring the mailto link is correctly formatted and functional
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking the Contact Us button in the header opens the default email client
Clicking the Contact Us button in the footer opens the default email client
Both mailto links pre-populate the To field with viitjeetec@gmail.com
The mailto link is properly formatted as href="mailto:viitjeetec@gmail.com"

constraints: Preserve the existing Contact Us button placement in both header and footer
Keep the button styling consistent with the current warm orange theme
nonGoals: Adding additional contact methods beyond email
Changing the email address from viitjeetec@gmail.com
